document_data.name: Kiyosu Kuroda
document_data.mainbody: '''Kiyosu Kuroda''' was a [[samurai]] retainer of [[Korimori clan]] in [[Maeshi Province]] in [[1360 DR]].
document_data.History: Kuroda was sent to lead a patrol of [[bushi]] near [[Ito-jo]] in order to stop an adventuring party hired by [[Michimori Uemon]] to took the [[Seven Swords]] to Uemon. He found and fought the adventurers but was defeated.
document_data.Personality: Kuroda was a honorable man, not wanting unnecessary victims. He cared for his men. In his current mission he only wanted to recover the relics, or harry and weaken the enemies.
